Charles Warner
==============

Charles Warn
er, Council Place 1
--------------------------------

![Charles Warner CC Photo](https://www.huttotx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=6716)

[Email Charles Warner](mailto:charles.warner@huttotx.gov)

I am a husband and father of two who has proudly called Hutto home since 2015. I have spent 25 years with Dell, bringing deep experience in large-scale operations, problem solving, and performance-driven decision making. In addition to my corporate career, I also own a travel business and actively invest in real estate.
I value objectivity, critical thinking, and data-driven decision making, with a strong focus on efficiency and practical solutions. Outside of work, I enjoy spending time with my family and traveling. I am committed to serving the community and working to do what is best for Hutto and its citizens.

Councilmember Warner was appointed to fill the unexpired vacant term for Place 1.
